txt.en: Ravenous snow-beasts have been drawn down their mountain's snowy peaks by the commotion at Aban-bazan.
Ravenous snow-beasts have been drawn down their mountain's snowy peaks by the commotion at Aban-bazan.
Ravenous snow-beasts have been drawn down their mountain's snowy peaks by the commotion at Aban-bazan.
You're the definition of motivated. I wish my workers had just as much get-up-and-go!
Ravenous snow-beasts have been drawn down their mountain's snowy peaks by the commotion at Aban-bazan.
You should let Irzeben know that you have defeated many snow-beasts.

'What's this now? Snow-beasts? I had heard the workers muttering darkly about some large creatures near the peaks. Even meant to ask you to look into it, but completely forgot about it. And look at you! You're the definition of motivated. I wish my workers had just as much get-up-and-go!\n\n'Well, you have my thanks for making the woods a safer place for all of us.'
